channel.title: Npc attack distance
channel.description:
im using tyreatta 317 source and client
ok so ive added the kraken and only one thing can attack at a time... idk how to fix
and the tentacles cant attack because their attack distance is to low idk how to change that please help thanks..

item.title: Npc attack distance
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

For distance your NPCHandler class should have a method “distanceRequired” or similar.

Try adding the area as a multi zone so multiple players can attack at once.

Read full topic
